name: Design
description: Initial state for the majority of Business Objects.

name: Pre-Production Change
description: Change state for objects that have passed into Pre-Production.

name: Pre-Production
description: State for objects that have been released to Oracle but are not 'Production Ready'.

name: Production Change
description: Change state for objects that habe passed into Production.

name: Obsolete
description: State for objects that are not to be used / reused.
